argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isnrg.1 | |- N = ( norm ` R ) |
| 2 |  | isnrg.2 | |- A = ( AbsVal ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( norm ` r ) = ( norm ` R ) ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( norm ` r ) = N ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( AbsVal ` r ) = ( AbsVal ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( AbsVal ` r ) = A ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_eleq12d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( norm ` r ) e. ( AbsVal ` r ) <-> N e. A ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-nrg | |- NrmRing = { r e. NrmGrp | ( norm ` r ) e. ( AbsVal ` r ) } |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( R e. NrmRing <-> ( R e. NrmGrp /\ N e. A ) ) |
